data.title: New Broadway-bound musical will debut in Boston starring Kristin Chenoweth
data.meta_description: "The Queen of Versailles" is set to premiere this July at the Emerson Colonial Theater in Back Bay. Kristin Chenoweth and the show's director, Michael Arden, sat down with WBZ-TV's Paula Ebben.
data.text:
Yahoo Sports

NFL training camp 2024: J.J. McCarthy will get first-team reps, per Vikings coach

Follow every development these next few weeks with Yahoo Sports before the NFL regular season starts.

Yahoo Life Shopping

This sun-blocking Columbia dress keeps heat and odors away, and it's down to $41

Buh-bye, B.O.: With sweat-wicking material that shields you from UVA and UVB rays, this flattering frock wins summer.

Yahoo Tech

Amazon Kindle Scribe review: A very good writing tablet and a pretty good e-reader

A big Kindle with a pen for taking notes? Sounds great. And for the most part it is.

Engadget

ThermoWorks' RFX Meat wireless probe uses radio waves instead of Bluetooth to monitor food on the grill

ThermoWorks employs radio waves for a more reliable wireless meat probe on its new RFX line of grilling gear.

Yahoo Finance

McDonald's to extend $5 meal deal until August, franchisees may get hit in the early innings

Per a memo obtained by Yahoo Finance, 93% of all McDonald's restaurants voted yes to extend the $5 meal deal through August.

Autoblog

2022 Ram 1500, Jeep Wagoneer with 5.7L eTorque probed for stalling issue

The 2022 Ram 1500 and 2022 Jeep Wagoneer with the 5.7-liter V8 eTorque system are now under investigation.

Yahoo Sports

The Dodgers are back, Bobby Witt Jr. had a weekend and Cooperstown has new inductees

Jake Mintz and Jordan Shusterman break down all of the weekend series, discuss whether the Dodgers are fully back, why Ty France was placed on waivers and who got inducted into the Hall of Fame in Cooperstown.

Autoblog

Why, believe it or not, the Lincoln Nautilus is one of 'America's hottest brands'

Adidas Sambas, Sol de Janeiro skin care products, Nvidia AI chips, and... the Lincoln Nautilus? Here's why the SUV made Ad Age's list of 20 hottest brands.

Yahoo Finance

Stock market news today: Tech roars back as S&P 500, Nasdaq surge

Investors are surveying a changed political landscape after Biden called off his re-election bid, assessing what it could mean for the Trump trade.

Yahoo News

'The End': How newspapers around the world covered Biden's exit from the race

Most ran photos of a somber-looking Biden, some with him walking toward an exit or up the steps onto Air Force One. Others chose images of Biden and Harris together to symbolize his passing of the torch.

Yahoo Life Shopping

These mega-popular tummy-control leggings are down to $8 at Amazon

The high-rise waist of these super-soft leggings is made of a wide elastic band to smooth out your middle.

Yahoo Sports

2024 NFL offseason power rankings countdown and season preview

Our Frank Schwab counts down his NFL power rankings, grades each team's offseason, solicits fantasy football advice and previews what the 2024 season might have in store for each team.

Yahoo Life Shopping

This 'really flattering' lacy top that's great for layering is a steal at $13

The all-season blouse looks great on its own or layered when the A/C is pumping.

Engadget

The Google Pixel 8a is on sale for a low of $449

The Google Pixel 8a is our pick for the best Android smartphone for less than $500, and now it's $50 cheaper than usual.

TechCrunch

Cohere raises $500M to beat back generative AI rivals

Cohere, a generative AI startup co-founded by ex-Google researchers, has raised $500 million in new cash from investors including Cisco, AMD and Fujitsu. The round, which also had participation from Canadian pension investment manager PSP Investments and Canada's export credit agency EDC, values Toronto-based Cohere at $5.5 billion, according to Bloomberg. Josh Gartner, head of communications at Cohere, told TechCrunch that the financing sets Cohere up for "accelerated growth."
